abilities.name: Icefire
about: Combination of Frostballs and Fireballs that explode on impact

abilities.name: Storm Call
about: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast

abilities.name: Fireball Projectiles
about: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes

abilities.name: Storm Call
about: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast

abilities.name: Ice Spear
about: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies
